scripts.buildWebsite: (cd website && npm ci && npm run build)
scripts.buildLambda: (cd lambda && cargo lambda build --release) && (rm lambda/build -rf && rm lambda/dist -rf && mkdir -p lambda/build/public && mkdir -p lambda/dist) && (cp lambda/target/lambda/lambda/bootstrap lambda/build/)
scripts.release: npm ci && npm-run-all -pl buildWebsite lint buildLambda && npm run zipLambda
